review: I have a Samsung smart TV with all the apps, only reason to buy Comcast to be able to cast everything from any of the portable devices laptops, smartphones and tablets. Much to my disappointment cast images ONLY works for specific applications supported by chromecast. Also Apple/QuickTime movie trailers would not work either even if the plug in for chrome browser is present. Last but not the least I noticed everytime I turn on the TV Samsung remote would not work, let's say, to increase or decrease the volume, workaround is to get the chromecast disconnected either physically or at software layer in order to have control. In addition to this there is a lag casting the contents over to the tv, my guess is it mgut work better qoth wireless AC mode capability. So in a nutshell it has been a waste for me to invest in chromecast.
